name: Biblical origins
description: Origin of Judaism tracing back to the biblical patriarch Abraham.

name: Exodus and the covenant
description: The story of the Exodus from Egypt, as recounted in the Hebrew Bible.

name: Ancient Israel and the monarchy
description: The history of ancient Israel and the establishment of the United Monarchy under King Saul, David, and Solomon.

name: Exile and return
description: The Babylonian exile, the destruction of the First Temple, and the eventual return of the Jewish people to rebuild the Second Temple.

name: Rabbinic Judaism
description: The development of Rabbinic Judaism following the destruction of the Second Temple.

name: Diaspora and Jewish communities
description: Throughout history, Jewish communities have been dispersed across the globe, influencing the development of different Jewish traditions, customs, and beliefs.
